This is a mistaken realization, with L.H as a tone pattern, instead of the correct pattern: H.H. A likely explanation for this error at this point in the recording is carry-over of the tone pattern of the previous numeral: the consultant unwittingly reproduced the same L.H pattern as for 'eight nights'.
Underlying tone category: *L.H
Orthographic representation (proposed by Roselle Dobbs): gguhan
